Label: LABEL
Locus: C 'is located in genetic locus' some %

Label: HLA-A allele
definition: allele for the HLA-A gene that is involved in immune responses and histocompatibility processes.

Label: HLA-B allele
definition: allele for the HLA-B gene that  plays a role in both immune responses and histocompatibility processes.

Label: HLA-C allele
definition: allele for the HLA-C gene that plays a role in both immune responses and histocompatibility processes.

Label: HLA-DPA1 allele
definition: allele for the HLA-DPA1 gene that is involved in the regulation of both cellular immune responses and antigen presentation.

Label: HLA-DPB1 allele
definition: allele for the HLA-DPB1 gene that plays a critical regulatory role in antigen presentation and peptide binding specificity.

Label: HLA-DQA1 allele
definition: allele for the HLA-DQA1 gene that plays a role in antigen presentation and immunoregulation.

Label: HLA-DQB1 allele
definition: allele for human HLA-DQB1 gene that is involved in the mediation of antigen presentation.

Label: HLA-DRA allele
definition: allele for the HLA-DRA gene that plays a role in antigen presentation.

Label: HLA-DRB1 allele
definition: allele on the HLA-DRB1 gene, which is involved in immunoregulation and antigen presentation. The gene has several hundred alleles and polymorphism typing is routinely performed for bone marrow and kidney transplantation.

Label: HLA-DRB3 allele
definition: allele for the HLA-DRB3 gene that is involved in immunoregulation and antigen presentation.

Label: HLA-DRB4 allele
definition: allele for the HLA-DRB4 gene that plays a role in both antigen presentation and the regulation of T-cell-mediated immunity.

Label: HLA-DRB5 allele
definition: allele for the HLA-DRB5 gene that is involved in the regulation of T-cell-mediated immunity and antigen presentation.

Label: HLA-E allele
definition: allele for HLA-E gene.

Label: HLA-F allele
definition: allele for HLA-F gene that is involved in the presentation of cytoplasmic protein fragments to cytotoxic lymphocytes.

Label: HLA-G allele
definition: allele for HLA-G gene that is involved in antigen processing and presentation.

Label: MHC Class I allele
definition: allele on a family of genes that encode major histocompatibility complex proteins and are involved in the presentation of cytoplasmic protein fragments to cytotoxic lymphocytes.

Label: MHC Class II allele
definition: allele for a family of genes expressed mainly by antigen presenting cells that encode major histocompatibility complex proteins and are involved in the presentation of fragments from phagocytized extracellular proteins to cytotoxic lymphocytes.

Label: Major Histocompatibility Complex allele
definition: allele for gene that is on a group of linked loci, collectively termed H-2 complex in the mouse and HLA complex in humans, that codes for cell-surface histocompatibility antigens and is the principal determinant of tissue type and transplant compatibility.

Label: human MHC class I allele
definition: allele located at human MHC class I locus.

Label: human MHC class II allele
definition: allele located at human MHC class II locus.
